short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that keeps you focused.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Traction Control is a handy Chrome extension that helps you stay focused and productive online. Sometimes you get distracted by certain websites when you're trying to get work done. With Traction Control, you can put an end to that.

Just make a list of the websites that keep pulling you away from your tasks. Traction Control keeps an eye on your browsing. Whenever you visit one of these distracting sites, it will redirect you back to your localhost:3000, your to-do list or any other URL you specify.

With using Traction Control, you'll regain control of your online habits and increase your productivity. Just toggle it on when you need that extra boost of focus.
